H3.text: what is the primary language of china. Standard Mandarin

A4.text: Standard Chinese serves as a lingua franca to facilitate communication between speakers of mutually unintelligible varieties of Chinese and non-Sinitic languages.

A5.text: Over 80% of the Chinese population were able to speak Standard Chinese as of 2020.
